backend/main.mo: Actor defining admin auth, user profiles, vehicles, promotions, media assets, interactions, and visitor stats with mixin-based storage and authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing multiple frontend components, pages, and admin tools for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base configuration defining light/dark theme variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading the main entry script.
frontend/REDEPLOYMENT.md: Guide for redeploying the frontend canister and manually validating all routes post-deployment.
frontend/src/admin/AdminGuard.tsx: Admin route guard handling authentication and a temporary emergency bypass mode for debug access.
frontend/src/admin/AdminLayout.tsx: Provides the admin dashboard layout with navigation, active-link highlighting, and logout handling.
frontend/src/admin/auth/adminSession.ts: Manages admin session storage with localStorage and cookies, including migration from legacy keys and token retrieval.
Enables an emergency debug bypass that auto-creates a Super Admin session and skips authentication.
frontend/src/admin/components/AccessDeni: Displays an access denied screen with a redirect button to the admin login page.
frontend/src/admin/components/BlogFormDi: A dialog for creating or editing blog posts with controlled form fields and image selection.
frontend/src/admin/components/ConfirmDel: A reusable confirmation dialog for delete actions with customizable text and loading state.
Generic CRUD table component with search, edit/delete actions, and optional published status badges.
frontend/src/admin/components/media/Medi: Media browser with search, preview, and delete functionality backed by admin CMS queries.
Modal to search and select a media asset, returning its URL to the caller.
Upload button that converts files to data URLs and creates media assets through CMS APIs.
frontend/src/admin/components/PromotionF: Dialog for creating or editing promotions with form inputs, image selection, and publish toggle.
frontend/src/admin/components/Testimonia: Dialog form for creating or editing testimonials with fields for text, rating, image, and publish state.
frontend/src/admin/components/VehicleFor: Dialog form for adding or editing vehicles, handling specs, media fields, commercial flags, and variant data.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminCmsQuer: React Query hooks for CRUD operations on media assets, contacts, credit simulations, and visitor data using the admin actor.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminLoginDe: Deprecated empty module kept for compatibility with old imports.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminSession: Manages admin session state with validation, login, logout, and optional emergency bypass mode.
frontend/src/admin/pages/AdminLoginDebug: Provides a debug interface to test admin login calls and display raw results.
Renders the admin login form, handles authentication, redirects, and emergency bypass behavior.
frontend/src/admin/pages/AdminProfilePag: Displays and edits the admin user's profile, loading existing data and saving updates.
frontend/src/admin/pages/BlogAdminPage.t: Implements blog management with list, search, create, edit, and delete operations using CMS APIs.
frontend/src/admin/pages/DashboardPage.t: Shows high‑level CMS statistics for vehicles, promotions, testimonials, blog posts, contacts, and simulations.
Manages contact form leads and credit simulation requests with search, filtering, and delete functionality. Uses tabs to switch between contacts and simulations and displays confirmation dialogs for deletions.
frontend/src/admin/pages/MediaManagerPag: Displays a media management interface with upload support and error alerts. Loads media assets and renders the media manager panel.
frontend/src/admin/pages/PromotionsAdmin: Provides CRUD management for promotions with search, edit, delete, and form dialogs. Integrates table rendering and mutation hooks for backend operations.
frontend/src/admin/pages/TestimonialsAdm: Enables CRUD operations for testimonials with search, edit, delete, and form dialogs. Renders testimonials in a table with rating and review previews.
frontend/src/admin/pages/VehiclesAdminPa: Handles vehicle management with category filtering, search, and CRUD actions. Uses a table view and form dialogs to create or edit vehicles.
frontend/src/admin/pages/VisitorStatsAdm: Displays visitor statistics in metric cards and provides a form to update stats. Fetches current stats and supports saving edited values via mutation.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root router configuration defining all public and admin routes with layouts and components.
frontend/src/components/forms/ContactFor: Form component for submitting contact inquiries, validating required fields and sending data via useAddContact.
frontend/src/components/forms/CreditSimu: Form for submitting credit simulation requests with validation and submission through useAddCreditSimulation.
frontend/src/components/GlobalErrorBound: Implements a global React error boundary that logs errors and shows a fallback UI with a refresh button. Catches rendering errors and prevents app crashes.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer displaying dealer info, social links, and a branded copyright section.
frontend/src/components/layout/PublicLay: Public-facing page layout including navbar, optional hero section, content area, CTA section, and footer.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Mobile bottom bar offering quick actions for calling, WhatsApp, credit simulation, and opening the main menu.
frontend/src/components/navigation/MainM: Slide-up sheet showing navigation links for mobile menu access.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Navba: Top navigation bar with links, WhatsApp contact button, and mobile slide-out menu.
frontend/src/components/sections/BottomC: CTA section prompting users to contact the dealer via WhatsApp.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Simple hero section with a title and tagline.
frontend/src/components/vehicles/Vehicle: Card displaying vehicle info, pricing, features, and actions for consulting or viewing details.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines react-query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as vehicles, promotions, blog posts, and interactions.
frontend/src/hooks/useVisitorTracking.ts: Tracks unique visitors and page views using mutations and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS base styles and custom design tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, React Query, and Internet Identity provider configuration.
frontend/src/pages/BlogDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single blog post, updates SEO metadata, and handles loading or missing content states.
frontend/src/pages/BlogListPage.tsx: Lists blog posts with previews and links to detail pages, showing a message when none exist.
frontend/src/pages/CommercialVehicleDeta: Shows detailed vehicle info with interactions like liking and sharing, including UI controls and stats.
frontend/src/pages/CommercialVehiclesPag: Displays categorized commercial vehicle listings filtered into light duty, medium duty, and tractor head groups.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact page with a form, contact details, a map iframe, and a sales consultant profile.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays homepage with banner carousel, featured vehicles, search, about section, and latest blog posts.
frontend/src/pages/PassengerVehicleDetai: Shows detailed info for a passenger vehicle including variants, pricing, like/share actions, and consultation link.
frontend/src/pages/PassengerVehiclesPage: Lists all passenger vehicles with loading state and empty-state handling.
frontend/src/pages/PromoPage.tsx: Displays current promotions with images, descriptions, validity, and terms.
frontend/src/pages/TestimonialsPage.tsx: Renders customer testimonials with ratings, images, and reviews.
frontend/src/redeploy/routeSmoke.ts: Defines public/admin routes and utilities for smoke testing and route validation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color system, extended theme values, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, architecture requirements, known issues, and existing features for an automotive website with stable backend persistence and an admin CMS.
